languages.text: "Мне показалось, или в голосе твоем сквозит уважение к родственничкам? Осторожнее, остроухая, шерин не придется по вкусу эта симпатия, если она там есть".
"Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."
languages.original_text: "Мне показалось, или в голосе твоем сквозит уважение к родственничкам? Осторожнее, остроухая, шерин не придется по вкусу эта симпатия, если она там есть".

traits.locale_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我是不是从你的话里听到了你对你那些黑暗表亲的敬意？当心点，我的尖耳朵朋友，如果那真的是敬意，恐怕我亲爱的行商浪人不会喜欢。”
languages.original_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."

traits.locale_text: “我是不是从你的话里听到了你对你那些黑暗表亲的敬意？当心点，我的尖耳朵朋友，如果那真的是敬意，恐怕我亲爱的行商浪人不会喜欢。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Serait-ce du respect pour vos semblables que j'entends transparaître dans votre voix ? Attention, ma chère amie aux oreilles pointues. Votre admiration risque d'être mal reçue par {mf|mon|ma} shereen. »
languages.original_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."

traits.locale_text: « Serait-ce du respect pour vos semblables que j'entends transparaître dans votre voix ? Attention, ma chère amie aux oreilles pointues. Votre admiration risque d'être mal reçue par {mf|mon|ma} shereen. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Escucho respeto por tus parientes en tu voz? Cuidado, mi amiga de orejas puntiagudas, porque a mi shereen no le hará gracia que expreses admiración por ellos, si es lo que era».
languages.original_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."

traits.locale_text: «¿Escucho respeto por tus parientes en tu voz? Cuidado, mi amiga de orejas puntiagudas, porque a mi shereen no le hará gracia que expreses admiración por ellos, si es lo que era».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「アンタの声には親類に対する敬意が含まれているように聞こえたよ？気をつけな、とんがり耳さん。シェリーンはヤツらを褒めるなんざ許さないんだから、それが事実だったとしてもね」
languages.original_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."

traits.locale_text: 「アンタの声には親類に対する敬意が含まれているように聞こえたよ？気をつけな、とんがり耳さん。ダーリンはヤツらを褒めるなんざ許さないんだから、それが事実だったとしてもね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Höre ich in Eurer Stimme etwa Respekt vor Eurer Verwandtschaft? Vorsicht, meine spitzohrige Freundin. {mf|Meinem Shereen|Meiner Shereen} wird es gar nicht gefallen, wenn Ihr Bewunderung für sie zeigt ... falls dem denn so ist."
languages.original_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."

traits.locale_text: "Höre ich in Eurer Stimme etwa Respekt vor Eurer Verwandtschaft? Vorsicht, meine spitzohrige Freundin. Meinem Shereen wird es gar nicht gefallen, wenn Ihr Bewunderung für sie zeigt ... falls dem denn so ist."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."

languages.text: "Akrabalarından saygıyla bahsettiğini mi duyuyorum? Dikkatli ol sivri kulaklı dostum. Doğru duyduysam şirinim, bu hayranlık düşüncelerinden hoşlanmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Is that respect for your kin I hear in your voice? Careful, my pointy-eared friend, my shereen won't like you showing admiration for them, if that is what it was."

traits.locale_text: "Akrabalarından saygıyla bahsettiğini mi duyuyorum? Dikkatli ol sivri kulaklı dostum. Doğru duyduysam şirinim, bu hayranlık düşüncelerinden hoşlanmayacaktır."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
